select t.id id, t.pid pid, t.code code, t.tenant_name tenant_name, t.status status, t.remark remark, t.create_time create_time, t.update_time update_time, t.delete_time delete_time, if(exists(select * from tenant c where c.pid = t.id and c.delete_time is null), 1, 0) as has_children from tenant t where t.delete_time is null
and t.id = #{id}
and t.pid = 0
order by t.create_time asc
